website_summaries.verdict: A very durable option that gets the job done at a price you'll like. A good value on a stainless steel single-bowl sink.
pros: Undermount sink that is easy to install and looks good
Constructed of 18-gauge stainless steel that's strong and resists rust
cons: Tends to drain slowly, resulting in residue in the bowl

customer_reviews.title: These are very high quality strong stainless steel sinks
customer_reviews.text: When we got new counter tops we wanted sinks to match the quality and the Mensarjor Sinks are just that. They are very strong heavy/thick stainless steel sinks. Our installers were very impressed with the weight and quality of the sinks. They are also insulated so they don't sound tinny or hollow, but instead sound solid. We are very happy with all three of the Mensarjor sinks we purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Samples

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sink!
customer_reviews.text: As a plumber I was skeptical about ordering a sink online I've never heard of but it turns out this is a very nice heavy duty sink. I also was pleased with the attachments that came with it. I would definitely recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tom b

customer_reviews.title: Deep & Big.. love it
customer_reviews.text: We are renovating our 90’s kitchen and we’re in need of a new under mount sink when we put in countertops.. I checked the big box stores and found the style I liked but the prices were high... Checked amazon and immidiately decided on this sink... glad I did...!! Reviews for this sink were the deciding factor ..Definitely would recommend this sink to friends/family ..
customer_reviews.author: PeachyDeez

customer_reviews.title: Installation Tips I found
customer_reviews.text: Fine finished competitive product within this price range. For installation, 30 x 18 inch sink will fill into a34 inch base cabinet. If you are replacing a sink, make sure it fits the existing cutout. If the cabinet allows, you may be able to install a larger sink by expanding the cutout. If your are planning on undermounting your sink, you need to measure your cabinet from inside edge to inside edge and subtract 3 to 4 inches from its overall size. This measurement is the largest sink that will fit into that sink base.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Yang

customer_reviews.title: Great sink
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a rental home of ours during the kitchen remodel. Basically the same sink the granite guys wanted to sell us for have the price. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: FCI

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this sink!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this gorgeous sink and it comes with awesome accessories too! What a great buy, and it looks fabulous too. Five stars all the way!!! The pix are from a kitchen still being finished, but you can still see how beautiful it is.
customer_reviews.author: DaVid

customer_reviews.title: Grade A quality, incredible value and superior customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for our kitchen island and the larger 32"x19" sink for the main kitchen area and they are both beautiful. The quality is much better than I expected and the sound insulating material is a big plus. There features are comparable to sinks at 3 times the price. They arrived on time and in perfect condition. The only issue was the metal wire dish rack for the bottom of the smaller (island) sink was not in the box, I contacted Fred at MENSARJOR and he has shipped one out. So far customer service in impeccable.
customer_reviews.author: Chris T.

customer_reviews.title: Strong sink but 15*17 is actually 13*15.
customer_reviews.text: Great sink, very heavy duty and got a great deal on it. I only have it three stars as the dimensions for the sink are the outer lip dimension, not the actual sink dimension. This was advertised as 15 x 17 sink, but the dimensions (pictures attached) are only 13 x 15. The depth is accurate. Aside from the dimensions, I would highly recommend this sink as it is very heavy duty and comes as described.
customer_reviews.author: James Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Impressive quality and a surprise!
customer_reviews.text: This is a high-quality 16 Gauge sink and the soundproofing features were installed and the sink feels solid. We had a difficult time finding a small sink for our downstairs apartment. This sink fit the bill perfectly and the best surprise was the drain. The drain is not your normal little perforated basket with a little stem in the middle. No, this sink has a stainless strainer basket that's 2.5" wide and 1.75" deep, which really makes a difference in the water flow through the drain. The old style clogs too fast, but not this one. And it's super easy to empty and clean. These are good sinks.
customer_reviews.author: Ya Varmint!

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sink
customer_reviews.text: This is an exceptionally well built sink, significantly heavier steel than what you can typically find at a big box home center and fully insulated which keeps it from sounding hollow.
customer_reviews.author: Otto Deydacht

customer_reviews.title: BEST BANG FOR YOUR BUCK!
customer_reviews.text: We shopped around EVERYWHERE for a sink like this, and this price and quality cannot be beat! You will not regret this purchase! We have been using it for about 2 months and it looks beautiful. We receive compliments on it from everyone that comes into our home.
customer_reviews.author: HMaggio

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Although these are undermount sinks we mount them from the top. We have fitted four of them this way. The hole you need to cut is slightly larger so ignore the template that's included. The lip that would normally be hidden is very neatly finished and looks like these where always mean't to be top mounted. We secure them with adhesive and silicon. The tray they provide for drying your plates or holding the sponges is also very nice.
customer_reviews.author: DanielE

customer_reviews.title: Great modern sink!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a rental unit, completely loved it. I was able to get my contractor to turn it into an under mount sink. Will have to get one of these for my place. Love the inclines that make the water go straight to the drain and the attachments it came with.
customer_reviews.author: Steph K

customer_reviews.title: The Quality And Price Is Amazing. Please Purchase. You will not regret purchasing this sink
customer_reviews.text: Considering The Sink Came In Damage, That was not the manufacturer’s Faults. it is a very very well made and structured sink with a lot of extras things that came along with it. The quality of the sink is Amazing For the price and extras that came Along with it. I Am Returning the Damage one for Replacement. I will recommend this to everyone. Thank You So Much For Selling me this quality and affordable sink that meets my budget.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon H.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This sink is HUGE and I love it!!! You can have a sink full of dishes, but when you walk into the kitchen you can’t even tell because the sink is so deep! Such a great sink for the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Kacie Craig

customer_reviews.title: THIS SINK IS EVERYTHING
customer_reviews.text: This sink is an absolute steal! We were looking at different options at all of the home renovation places near us, we wanted one just like this, & we got it!! For about $500 less than they wanted to charge us. That was in a bundle with a nice faucet too. I’m so glad I looked on Amazon & saved money. We were able to focus on other points of our renovation thanks to the low pricing. It’s a very quality sink, had it installed for about a month now. No rust, no buildup, easy to clean out, the accessories that come with it are just lovely. We love it, can’t say enough good things about it.
customer_reviews.author: Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty sink for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: We've shopped around for small bar sinks and this was the cheapest by far for the size. When I pulled it from the box it was a lot heavier than I thought I was getting for the price. Extremely pleased with the sink. The only draw back would be the drain nut is made of plastic. When I tightened it down it would expand and jump the threads. Luckily I had an extra metal nut and it worked perfect. Still even with that it is still worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jim M.

customer_reviews.title: IT RUSTS
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the price, style and size. I had it put in under my kitchen counter top and it looked amazing. It has been in about a month and I started noticing rust spots forming all over where water sits. I cant even replace it because it is built into my kitchen counter top, AVOID.
customer_reviews.author: A. sh

customer_reviews.title: What a great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Great bar sink. Replacing my old builders grade one. Modern, clean lines and quiet. Looks great and came with several extras. And packed very well. Great value
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great sink and accessories
customer_reviews.text: This sink is solid and very nice. I actually didn't trust the brackets it came with after the thought of this huge sink full of water. I chose to drop it in rather than undermount because the top edge of this sink is finished very nice and it will take more of a beating than the edge of my counter. I am really happy with it. I didn't think I'd use the accessories but they are really great additions. It is so amazing using this sink. I would definitely recommend this sink. Easy to clean too.
customer_reviews.author: Mike V

customer_reviews.title: Good SInk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sink for my van conversion. Its small enough - 14X14 - to fit where I needed it and its deep enough to wash my hair in. The steel is thick and has sound absorbing insulation on the outside. My only concern was the instructions and the mounting clips provided; they didn't match.
customer_reviews.author: Alita

customer_reviews.title: Large and functional, but does not drain well
customer_reviews.text: Very spacious and funvtional, however does not drain very well. Bottom is too flat needs more pitch to drain opening. Dish water eventually drains but flatness of bottom results in significant residue build up over the entire sink bottom. Inordinate amount of rinsing sink required to get residue into drain.
customer_reviews.author: GLH

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Quality and great price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bar sink for a remodel project we are working on. The description described a high end unit. Taking a chance that the description was correct, I purchased it. This bar sink is far beyond my expectations. It is of very high quality, a beautifully hand crafted sink that will perfectly complete the high end custom cabinetry. We are extremely happy with this sink and the price was unbeatable. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Sue DeMers

customer_reviews.title: Great sink
customer_reviews.text: I love this sink! Its compact and deep. Perfect for my kitchen without taking all my counter space.
customer_reviews.author: Susan P.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but slopes the wrong direction
customer_reviews.text: The sink slopes away from the drain, so all food and water slope to the outer edges of the drain. It is a beautiful sink, but make sure you have a faucet with removable sprayer that stretches because you will be chasing food into the drain with it. It is frustrating. I wish it sloped into the direction of the drain. It is pretty! I have had no problems with scratching or dents.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sink
customer_reviews.text: Amazing farm sink. My wife absolutely loves the size and depth. She is able to wash all her pots with ease. And not to mention the quality of this sink is top notch. Recommended for any kitchen makeover looking for quality without spending to much $$.
customer_reviews.author: Mario A Ortega

customer_reviews.title: awesome quality
customer_reviews.text: best quality... i am a contractor and i do kitchen and bathrooms reno for a living... buy it, high quality and very sturdy... i did install khraus too.... this one amazed me
customer_reviews.author: BMW m5

customer_reviews.title: Great, big, modern sink!
customer_reviews.text: This sink is BEAUTIFUL. I love how deep it is and the grate that came with it is awesome. You can just set something down inside of it without having to touch the bottom of the sink. It holds a TON of dishes. As well as I can wash something in one part and still have other stuff in it.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, well made commercial look
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised when I saw the quality of this sink. Much heavier and commercial looking that the other better known brands. I'm using it for a custom outdoor kitchen and it looks fantastic. Bought a similar size Elkay for an inside prep sink and now wish I had purchased another Mensarjor instead.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good price
customer_reviews.text: This sink seems so much bigger than a standard 9” deep sink. It holds a LOT of dirty dishes which frees up my counter space and makes the kitchen look cleaner until I can get the dishes washed. It looks sleek and modern and it’s heavy enough that it doesn’t dent when pots and pans hit against the sides. I thought the price was great for the high quality. I’m very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mbina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: We remodeled our kitchen, wanting to replace the current small sink to something larger. This model is just absolutely perfect - it's deep with some very nice accessories - floating dish rack and grate. We love the sink.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Really nice sink!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sink. Works perfectly in my laundry room. The grate for the bottom is nice but makes it a little harder to keep the sink clean. I like it so I don't mind moving it to clean under then putting it back.
customer_reviews.author: L.

customer_reviews.title: water doesnt drain well. rusting forms
customer_reviews.text: water doesnt drain well. rusting forms. looks nice after installing but seems like a terrible product. i really regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This sink has worked incredibly well! The included accessories work really well in addition to the sink. We had the sink installed about two months ago and have had no problems whatsoever with it! Would definitely recommend to anyone shopping for a sink.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Adams

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our coffee bar. I'd read reviews of other sinks being described as 'flexible'. Not good. This one is heavy and, obviously, will never flex. It looks great and is perfect for what we needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Smith

customer_reviews.title: Goes great with our kitchen Island!
customer_reviews.text: We just got our kitchen remodeled and we got this under mount sink to save space for our granite kitchen island. It’s deep enough to hold enough dishes plus soap.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby Kosier

customer_reviews.title: High quality, a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Liked a lot. Nice thick steel and high quality. Only thing that’d be good would be to have the bottom tapered a degree or two so it drains faster. Other than that it is great. We like it a lot and is installed in our new kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Tandoormaker

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Sink arrived with a small dent and bent edge.. I straightened out bent edge. Overall it feels and looks great have not really used it as yet
customer_reviews.author: Ronic Atkins

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!!
customer_reviews.text: This farmhouse style sink is just what I’ve been looking for. I wanted the clean lines, without the rounded/curved corners, like most sinks have. This sink is deep with a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: PurpleDaisy

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I looked around alot for an undermount stainless steel sink that was deep enough for my laundry room and found this one. The sink is beautiful!! Just what I was looking for with an unbelievable price. It is well worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Large and Pretty
customer_reviews.text: nice undermount sink - very large - great value. Not only was it listed less than the Big Box store competitor, but it was also on sale! My contractor was surprised at how much I got it for!
customer_reviews.author: NBG

customer_reviews.title: Expecting what"s in picture!
customer_reviews.text: Love the sink,it is gorgeous! Was expecting the grid for the bottom of the sink, have search everywhere to by separate as an accessory to no avail......even went to company website.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Sink is heavy duty and thick stainless steel, but no slant to drain.
customer_reviews.text: We installed this sink as part of our kitchen remodel project. The sink is very high quality. The stainless finish is beautiful. Heavy stainless steel and super sturdy. My only complaint is the sink does not slant to the middle so the water doesn't run towards the drain. Thus, I have to scoop the food/water in the sink with my hand towards the drain. But overall very good purchase for the money!! Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sink
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sink! I liked how it came with the adjustable tray. I purchased this for my spec home. Will definitely buying this sink for all my other spec homes.
customer_reviews.author: Oli

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sink for our utility/laundry room
customer_reviews.text: This is a really solid sink. Well worth the money. I will probably buy another when we finish the basement.
customer_reviews.author: Ally G

customer_reviews.title: Great sleek sink
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. My wife loves the sleek look of the sink and completed the kitchen remodel. Would recommend to a friend
customer_reviews.author: herroeverybody

customer_reviews.title: Get the sink first so countertop can be cut accurately!
customer_reviews.text: The dimensions online are larger than the actual sink so the quartz company cut the hole larger for the undermount sink and part of the sink shows all the way around. Frustrating to say the least!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality sink
customer_reviews.text: Solid sink - high quality. I installed it in my basement bar and it looks very modern. And it comes with the rack and drain plus 3 sponges.
customer_reviews.author: dj

customer_reviews.title: Love it 😁
customer_reviews.text: I'm remodeling my kitchen and I love this sink good size for my family !!!
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Hi quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice product, many accessories, resulting in frequent compliments from family and friends...
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Good.. BUT.. Damaged
customer_reviews.text: The sink itself is very nice. The reason this isn’t a 5 Star review is due to the edge having a dent in it right out of the box. Hopefully it doesn’t impair the under mount installation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazed by the quality
customer_reviews.text: This is not the most expensive sink in the market, but it definitely worth the money. I was not expecting this quality build when I bought the stuff. It even came with several small attachments. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: XIAOYI

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, practical sink
customer_reviews.text: A large single sink is the best for preparing food. And this sink has it all. Complete with bottom rack for the sink and a side drying rack for misc items not going into the dishwasher. Quality construction, beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Janet in Elgin, IL

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made
customer_reviews.text: We have not yet installed our new kitchen sink, but the quality of the product is outstanding. Looks like we have everything we need to install. It was wrapped beautifully so there was vitually no chance of it denting.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is my first single bowl sink and I love it. It's nice and deep. You will have no issues washing your big pots or other items.
customer_reviews.author: L. Borja

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and thick
customer_reviews.text: I’ve not got my outdoor kitchen finished but I’ve had about 5 ppl compliment on how nice this sink is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. I saved a lot of money ordering on line as opposed to buying in a big box store. The sink arrived quickly and was packaged beautifully... highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: J. Outerbridge

customer_reviews.title: Great deep sink. Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this sink... well worth the money, it's super deep and comes with the rack which is nice and convenient. Only thing is when we got it the flange was bent at the corner but once the countertop was in you couldnt see it. ( probably a carrier issue)
customer_reviews.author: Sinisa

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great kitchen sink. Absolutely huge. Very sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Ralphabet

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the size , durability, look and the grate that protects the bottom of the sink!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer J.

customer_reviews.title: superior product and service
customer_reviews.text: First time in a long time that I received a product of this caliber in all categories from packaging to shipping to awsome product with extras. 1st class old fashioned as it should be definitely recommended this product and WILL buy again John Bucalo Racetrack Specialties fallbrook Ca
customer_reviews.author: john b.

customer_reviews.title: Great sink
customer_reviews.text: Really nice sink. I’m no expert but this seems as good as sinks that cost 2-3x as much.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Eisner

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: I love this sink. It looks fantastic and is nice and deep allowing for washing of big pots etc with ease. The small basket provided is also a nice feature. Definitely worth the money!

customer_reviews.title: Size of the sink
customer_reviews.text: The Sink is the perfect size for our bar. I was able to incorporate my disposal and everything without any issues. Also like the included drying rack. There isn't a lot of pitch towards the drain so sometimes you can find water pooling/standing a bit but other than that a great sink.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M Kenealy

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, functional sink! Its deep and love the placement of the offset drain towards back of sink. It makes it Very easy to work with multiple pieces at same time.

customer_reviews.title: Great sink!
customer_reviews.text: Wow what a high quality sink! With extras too! Love it!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality sink
customer_reviews.text: This sink is a heavy gauge of stainless that takes away all of the noise. I especially like bottom grille that protects the sink

customer_reviews.title: is never clean
customer_reviews.text: I clean every time I use and it is still not clean.
customer_reviews.author: DIKRAN D.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sink came with lots of accessories to make it useful.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hilbert

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, but...
customer_reviews.text: 18x14 undermount sink is fantastic. However taking 1 star off because the sink basket I received was broken. I would absolutely rate 5 star if they replaced it for me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great size for a laundry sink
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and added bonus products. It cleans easily and is deep enough for hand wash items in a laundry room.
customer_reviews.author: Cef

customer_reviews.title: Great sink, hands down.
customer_reviews.text: Best bar sink or prep sink you can buy. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this sink. Would pay 3 times as much anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: ReaderMe

customer_reviews.title: Water never drain perfectly, always water stays in the sink.
customer_reviews.text: Water never drain perfectly, always water stays in the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Natashenka

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We had been looking at a variety of options for weeks until we found this one. The size is perfect and accurate per the description. The quality of the finishes are really good. We absolutely love our sink and it works well with our overall design.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna & Robert Caravaglia

customer_reviews.title: A great deal
customer_reviews.text: A great deal! I was afraid it was too good to be true! Similar sinks from local stores were twice the money. The guy that installed my granite countertop couldn’t believe how much it paid for it. I am in love with this sink!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy King

customer_reviews.title: Great value, looks fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I buy stuff from Amazon all the time as we live in rural Idaho and I’ve never written a review before...but this sink is exceptional. Great value, packed very well, installed easy in our bar and looks stunning! A clear home run for us.
customer_reviews.author: David V. Latona

customer_reviews.title: Great Value !!
customer_reviews.text: I have a super small kitchen this sink worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful looks professional.
customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful one of the nicest things bought for the money.
customer_reviews.author: linda a delavan

customer_reviews.title: Great sink & price
customer_reviews.text: I researched sinks ready reviews and prices and this is by far the best deal I found and the sink is great!
customer_reviews.author: burn70down

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great sink. Comparable to the really expensive ones at half the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Basu

customer_reviews.title: Hell ya, buy this thing!
customer_reviews.text: This sink is stunning! Excellent depth and plenty of room for multiple pots and pans. For the price and gage # it's a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Malay B.

customer_reviews.title: Stainless steel bar sink.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sink, heavy gauge with a fair number of accessories included.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio de Paula

customer_reviews.title: I love this sink
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and it looks amazing in our new kitchen, although it does scratch easily and it is kind of slow to drain. Still not a deal breaker for me, it’sa great sink for the price. If I had to buy another sink tomorrow, I’d buy the same one again.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Godkin

customer_reviews.title: perfect size for our 24" sink base
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous, have been using it for several weeks now. Still looks great, love the racks.
customer_reviews.author: ddk

customer_reviews.title: Great product and Great seller
customer_reviews.text: I loved the sink...looks amazing and it comes with a lot of FREE stuff... The sink came bent but I called the seller and they send me a new one right away :). Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Ashi

customer_reviews.title: install at a slight angle to allow water to flow to the back
customer_reviews.text: We remodeled part of our kitchen. This sink was the only one in this size that fit into our existing sink cabinet. I couldn’t find one this size in any local stores.
customer_reviews.author: Faith L. Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Love the sink and it's space but does get scratched. Other than that no complaints. Good for value!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality! Just right for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product being used a sink in my utility room. The wire bottom rack and additional adjustable rack are both an added plus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Deep sink-very useful
customer_reviews.text: Sink is very deep and appears to be constructed very well. Good sink when your space does not allow for a double sink.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic size
customer_reviews.text: This sink looks great! We love how deep it is and the overall size can't be beat. The price was great. The only complaint we have is there is always a bit of water left in the bottom that does not drain out.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Diede

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: The is the perfect deep kitchen sink for our renovation. Arrived in pristine condition, installed easily, and looks beautiful.

customer_reviews.title: Is not set up for a disposal
customer_reviews.text: Cool sink, good price but it is not meant to be used with a garbage disposal.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Powell

customer_reviews.title: Marvelous Value
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. What a fab sink. Accessories up the ying yang. Durable.
customer_reviews.author: Peter A Yates

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Sink
customer_reviews.text: Great heavy-duty quality, shipped well in nice packaging to avoid damage. Came with several accessories as well. Would definitely recommend and would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Just received my awesome 17"×19" mensarjor stainless steel sink. I did my mathematics correct and it will fit perfectly into my 18×24 base cabinet ! I am going to mount it under my custom granite counter top . The quality of this product is two thumbs up! H J Ruks
customer_reviews.author: Harry Ruks

customer_reviews.title: COMPLETE
customer_reviews.text: This sink has everything including the drain which if bought separately is another $30. The 16 gauges steel is best for strength and I love that it comes with a sink base protector,
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellen Venter

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: The sink arrived in the predicted time frame. It is heavy duty. Even the installer of our new counter top was impressed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: terry

customer_reviews.title: Under mount Sink
customer_reviews.text: Honestly a very unique under mount sink and a great bang for your buck, I have installed this sink in every investment home I have done.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great bar or utility sink for the money.
customer_reviews.text: What a nice sink! Even a 5 gallon bucket fits down in the sink. Great hardware came with it! Most important is the strainer. Easy to remove and clean!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: MENSARJOR 32'' x 19'' Single Bowl Kitchen Sink 16 Gauge Undermount Stainless Steel Kitchen Sink, Bar or Prep Kitchen sink
feature_bullets: UNBREAKABLE CONSTRUCTION: 16 GAUGE Premium T304 Grade Stainless Steel for Super sturdy and extremely durable, Commercial Grade Brushed Finish dent and scratch resistant, Easy to clean and long-lasting.

UNIQUE DESIGN: MENSARJOR used Ultra quiet designs with thicker & softer Rubber Noise Reduction Pads. Anti-condensation Thickening Noise Reduction Coating, absorb sound from the SOURCE, and isolate condensate.

HANDCRAFTED BY SKILLED ARTISANS: the bottom is slightly tilted to prevent water from standing in the bowl. X grooves design is easy to drain, Rear set 3.5" drain matches most kitchen appliances and fits the Most Common Garbage Disposal System and unlocks extra space.

DEMENSIONS: Oversized 10" STAINLESS STEEL kitchen & bar prep sink skillets quick drain and dry with sloped base channels. Exterior dimensions: 32" (wide) x 19" (front-to-back) | Interior Dimensions: 30" (wide) x 17" (front-to-back) x 10" (bowl depth) | Min Cabinet Size: 35”.

WORRY-FREE CHIOCE: LIFETIME WARRANTY and customer service that puts you first. We stand behind our product and quality by offering the Amazon guaranteed 30 days return warranty. Includes: Multiple installation ways, including mounting hardware, pamphlets and installation guidance, Multi-functional stainless steel dish grid protects sink bottom, 3 piece basket strainer waste, 3 soft sponges for cleaning. CAD or professional helplines available.
